name: @nuke.dev/design-system
description: Element-first CSS design system with web components. Universal .style-1/2/3 pattern for native HTML elements and custom components.
author: nuke-studios <github@heer.dev>

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/icons && cp core/icons/*.svg dist/icons/ && tsc && sass core/core.scss dist/core.css && sass core/core.scss dist/core.min.css --style=compressed && esbuild core/core.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm
scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist/icons && cp core/icons/*.svg dist/icons/ && sass core/core.scss dist/core.css --watch & esbuild core/core.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --watch
